refactorings_applied: DRY: Removed duplicate groupIntoConversationPairs function from useInfiniteMessages.ts, now uses shared groupMessagesIntoPairs from @/lib/conversation-grouper
Documentation: Enhanced JSDoc comments with @param/@returns annotations for ConversationPairCard helper functions and sub-components
Documentation: Improved JSDoc comments for HistoryPane sub-components (LoadingIndicator, EmptyState)
notes: Code was already well-structured with good separation of concerns
CSS class constants already extracted in HistoryPane (BASE_CONTAINER_CLASSES)
Memoization already properly applied to components and hooks
Applied YAGNI principle - avoided unnecessary refactoring where code was already clean
message: Refactoring completed. Removed code duplication by consolidating conversation grouping logic into shared utility. Enhanced documentation with detailed JSDoc comments. All 1083 tests pass, static analysis shows 0 errors.
